successes.title: Darma: Sit smart for a healthy body and mind
successes.description: Darma is the world's first smart cushion that monitors your posture, sitting habits, stress level, and coaches you to sit better.

Pledges.description: THANK YOU! Every contribution brings us closer to our goal. We will keep you updated on our progress and you will receive a $10 discount on a purchase from Darma's online store.
Super Early Birds! One Darma cushion $100 off the standard retail price!
Early Birds! One Darma cushion 35% off the standard retail price!
Early Birds! One Darma cushion 35% off the standard retail price!
Get one Darma,  $20 off the standard retail price!

Early Adopter! Get your Darma before others. Take part in bringing our vision to life by visiting our offices in Palo Alto, CA or Shenzhen, China to try the prototype. If we incorporate your feedback, you'll be featured on our website! Becoming a part of history is priceless.
Buying together is better! Two Darmas and two t-shirts at a special price. One for you and one for someone special.
5 Darmas. You and your team will have super-human posture and super-size success!
Beat the people that are beating the Joneses by meeting the founders for dinner to design your very own CUSTOM Darma!

We've already had strong interest from many folks looking to license our awesome technology. Here's your chance to cut the line and be one of the first to explore potential partnerships with Darma while gaining early access to our developer kit.
